alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 9:13AM MST until January 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 55 below zero. * WHERE...Northern Campbell County, Southern Campbell County, Western Crook County and Northeastern Crook County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 2 PM MST this afternoon. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 2 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: A wind chill advisory means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands. A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. Even if you are outdoors for just a few minutes, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook
